CustomField.formula: IF( OR( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Billing__Status__c , 'Draft')) ,AND( OR(ISPICKVAL( APTS_Integration_Status__c , 'Requested'), ISPICKVAL(APTS_Integration_Status__c, 'To be Processed')) ,OR(ISBLANK( APTS_Integration_Requested__c ), (NOW() - APTS_Integration_Requested__c) * 24.0 * 60.0 < 5.0) ) , APTS_LineItemCount__c <= 0 ) ,NULL ,HYPERLINK("/apex/APTS_CMCalculateTax?id="&Id, IMAGE("/resource/APTS_Button_CalculateTax", "Calculate Tax"),"_self") )
CustomField.label: Calculate Tax
